A C D E F G L P S T U V 

C

com.saurabh.dao - package com.saurabh.dao
Provides necessary classes for implementing the CRUD operations on all the four Entities which are : Student, Course, Teacher, and Fee
com.saurabh.entity - package com.saurabh.entity
Provides necessary POJO Entity Classes and establishes a meaningful relationship between those entity classes.
com.saurabh.mapped - package com.saurabh.mapped
Provides a mapped super class which is inherited by Student and Teacher Entity
com.saurabh.service - package com.saurabh.service
Provides necessary Service Layers for each Entity which mediates the communication between the REST Controller and the Repository.
com.saurabh.test - package com.saurabh.test
Provides necessary test classes for Unit Testing.
Course - Class in com.saurabh.entity
This Class is a Course Entity which has all the variables related to course details and has a one-to-many relationship with Teacher Entity and one-to-one relationship with Fee Entity
Course() - Constructor for class com.saurabh.entity.Course
 
CourseDao - Interface in com.saurabh.dao
This Interface is used declare the Methods for CRUD operation on Course Entity
CourseDaoImpl - Class in com.saurabh.dao
This Class is used to perform CRUD operations on Course Entity which interacts with the Database
CourseDaoImpl() - Constructor for class com.saurabh.dao.CourseDaoImpl
 
CourseRestController - Class in com.saurabh.controller
This Class is used to handle all the REST APIs related to the Course Entity.
CourseRestController() - Constructor for class com.saurabh.controller.CourseRestController
 
CourseService - Interface in com.saurabh.service
This Interface is used to declare methods for CRUD operations of Course Entity through Course Service Layer
CourseServiceImpl - Class in com.saurabh.service
This Class is a Service Layer between the Course Repository and Course REST Controller.
CourseServiceImpl() - Constructor for class com.saurabh.service.CourseServiceImpl
